<div style="text-align: center; padding: 20px;">
  <h2>Real-time Netflix Users</h2>
  <canvas id="userChart" width="800" height="400" style="border: 1px solid #ddd;"></canvas>
  <p style="color: #666; margin-top: 15px;">Updates every 2 seconds</p>
</div>

<div id="live-counter-bottom" style="text-align: center; margin-top: 20px; font-size: 1.1em;">
ðŸ”´ LIVE: Loading...
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
<script>
// Initialize data arrays
let timeLabels = [];
let userCounts = [];
let maxDataPoints = 15;

// Get canvas and create chart
const ctx = document.getElementById('userChart').getContext('2d');
const chart = new Chart(ctx, {
    type: 'line',
    data: {
        labels: timeLabels,
        datasets: [{
            label: 'Active Users (Millions)',
            data: userCounts,
            borderColor: '#E50914',
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(229, 9, 20, 0.1)',
            borderWidth: 3,
            pointBackgroundColor: '#E50914',
            pointBorderColor: '#fff',
            pointBorderWidth: 2,
            pointRadius: 5,
            tension: 0.4,
            fill: true
        }]
    },
    options: {
        responsive: false,
        maintainAspectRatio: false,
        plugins: {
            legend: {
                display: true,
                position: 'top'
            }
        },
        scales: {
            x: {
                title: {
                    display: true,
                    text: 'Time',
                    font: { size: 14, weight: 'bold' }
                }
            },
            y: {
                title: {
                    display: true,
                    text: 'Active Users (Millions)',
                    font: { size: 14, weight: 'bold' }
                },
                min: 210,
                max: 250
            }
        },
        animation: {
            duration: 800
        }
    }
});

function updateGraph() {
    // Generate new data point
    const now = new Date().toLocaleTimeString();
    const users = +(220 + Math.random() * 20).toFixed(1);
    
    // Update live counter at the bottom
    document.getElementById('live-counter-bottom').innerHTML = 
        'ðŸ”´ <strong>LIVE:</strong> <span style="color: #E50914; font-weight: bold;">' + users + ' Million Users Online</span>';
    
    // Add new data
    timeLabels.push(now);
    userCounts.push(users);
    
    // Keep only last 15 points
    if (timeLabels.length > maxDataPoints) {
        timeLabels.shift();
        userCounts.shift();
    }
    
    // Update chart
    chart.update('none'); // No animation for smoother updates
}

// Start updates
updateGraph();
setInterval(updateGraph, 2000);
</script>
